column1: (1) Estimate the percentage change due to recalculation with respect to the previous submission (percentage change = 100 x [(LS-PS)/PS], where LS = latest submission and PS = previous submission. All cases of recalculation of the estimate of the source/sink category should be addressed and explained in the NIR.
Parties should provide detailed information on recalculations in chapter 11 of the NIR. Use this documentation box to provide references to other relevant sections of the NIR.
